page.title: 01Purley to Waddon
page.content: By Neil Riches Thomas More School There are many different character- istics in our allocated area. The most prominent of these is the large amount of open space and public playing fields. Coming along the Purley Way from our school, towards Five Ways, there are open spaces along the entire length of the road. These playing fields take up roughly 1km of squared ground. Another characteristic is the large amount of light industrial works in and around Purley playing fields area. There are many small factories and large warehouses in this area. The other main feature is the large amount of residential development beyond this zone. This takes up about 11km of our area especially near Five Ways, and it comprises a large prop- ortion of high quality housing.
